subject: URGENT: Account Suspended
body: Your bank account has been suspended. Click the link immediately to verify your details.

subject: Meeting Reminder
body: Reminder about the project meeting scheduled tomorrow at 10 AM.

subject: Big Sale!!! Limited Offer
body: Buy now and get 70% discount. Hurry, offer expires today.

subject: Project Deadline
body: Please submit the final project report by EOD today. This is important.

subject: Exam Timetable Released
body: The semester examination timetable has been released. Please check the university portal.

subject: Security Alert
body: We detected a new login to your account. Secure your account immediately if this was not you.

subject: Weekly Tech Newsletter
body: Top technology news and updates for this week.

subject: Office Holiday Notice
body: Office will remain closed tomorrow due to a public holiday.

subject: Your Order Has Been Shipped
body: Your order has been shipped and will arrive in 3-5 days.

subject: Internship Interview Invitation
body: You have been shortlisted for the internship interview. Confirm availability.

subject: Transaction Alert
body: Rs. 5,000 has been debited from your account. Contact immediately if not you.

subject: Exclusive Travel Offers
body: Book your holiday now with exclusive discounts.

subject: Code Review Required
body: Please review the submitted code and provide feedback today.

subject: Weekend Plan
body: Are we still on for the weekend movie plan?

subject: Electricity Bill Due
body: Your electricity bill is due tomorrow. Please pay on time.

subject: Credit Card Transaction Alert
body: A transaction was detected on your credit card.

subject: New Job Recommendations
body: Check out new job opportunities based on your profile.

subject: Tech Conference Registration
body: Register now for the upcoming tech conference.

subject: Limited Time Food Discount
body: Get flat 50% off on your next order.

subject: Assignment Submission Reminder

subject: New Shows This Week
body: Explore newly released movies and series.

subject: URGENT: Unusual Login Attempt
body: We noticed an unusual login attempt on your account.

subject: Hall Ticket Available
body: Download your examination hall ticket.

subject: Service Request Update

subject: UPI Payment Alert

body: Improve your coding skills with these tips.

body: You're invited to my birthday party this Saturday.
